title: Dice Expecter
description: Calculate the expected value of the dice, etc. You can predict what kind of result you will get when you roll the dice.

result.title: Result
result.CI_tips: It means that if you do it 100 times, about 95 of those times will be in this range. However, this is not accurate because of the approximations made.

usage.title: Usage
usage.description: Entering a formula involving dice will calculate the expected value of that formula. Please refer to the input example below.
